event.title: "Open Source Day," Göteborg, Sweden
event.body:
Adriaan de Groot and Karsten Gerloff will speak about Business Case studies and Free Software Licenses during the "Open Source Day" preceding FSCONS.
Place: World Culture Museum, Södra vägen 54, Gothenburg
Date: 13th of November from 12.00 to 17.30
Price: 995 SEK (30% rebate at FSCONS)
More information on OSD website
